title: 怎么用say指令输出计分板的值？
author: ITZDC9
txt_content: 如果say不行title，tellraw的指令也可以（好想更好233）

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content:
tellraw @a ["",{"text":"你的分数是："},{"score":{"objective":"foo","name":"*"}}]
红色加粗的 foo 是记分板名称。

replies.author: Chelover_C60
ITZDC9
replies.txt_content:
CrazyPeanut 发表于 2020-2-29 11:46
tellraw @p {"text":"这里是提示：","extra":[{"score":{"objective":"记分板名","name":"@p"}}]
"name":"@p"是啥

replies.author: Sssss...
replies.txt_content:
spdir 发表于 2020-2-29 11:51
"name":"@p"是啥
表示要输出的是@p的分数

replies.author: ITZDC9
replies.txt_content:
CrazyPeanut 发表于 2020-2-29 11:44
tellraw @p {"text":"这里是提示：","extra":[{"score":{"objective":"记分板名","name":"@p"}}]
额无效的json忘记说了是1.12版本
